Features
Features: Take on today's most challenging, graphics-intensive games without missing a beat. The GeForce GTX 1070 graphics card delivers the incredible speed and power of NVIDIA Pascal - the most advanced GPU ever created. This is the ultimate gaming platform.

The same immense power is now contained in just above 8 inches - perfect for any mini-ITX build. Size and power need no compromise.
